author: Ana Alicia Herrera
description: Ana Alicia Herrera says of her drink, "The inspiration comes from something I learnt in New Orleans when I first became a bartender. Devil Woman is s new twist on a classic Gibson Martini."
name: Devil Woman
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
